attributes.action: No projected State visit by President Trump to mark the D-Day landings.
attributes.additional_details:
On the 8th of April 2019 the Metro reported that Trump was due to be given a state procession and visit before attending the 75th anniversary of the D-Day landings memorials in June.

https://metro.co.uk/2019/04/08/donald-trump-get-full-state-visit-including-carriage-procession-june-9130848/?fbclid=IwAR2MpOJiowVTKDYudd7lLPeohRYP0Pw3bfzYwY8-VEtYVH1td6KeuYzaWc4
attributes.background:
The USA had a heroic role in fighting the forces of Nazism. We welcome a US representative of good character, but not a man so closely allied with modern Nationalist Populism, and race and religious hatred.
It is also unacceptable demand that the sovereign should be asked to receive such a man.
